trans-unit.target: TEXT_KINGMF102_04947_SEQ_00<tab>Wuk Lamat wishes to look in on her soldiers.
TEXT_KINGMF102_04947_TODO_00<tab>Speak with Koana.
TEXT_KINGMF102_04947_TODO_01<tab>Speak with Koana again.
TEXT_KINGMF102_04947_GULOOLJA_000_000<tab>I wish there was something I could do to help...
TEXT_KINGMF102_04947_KOANA_000_001<tab>I understand Zoraal Ja spared no souls for reviving himself in battle. His pride wouldn't permit him to do otherwise, I expect...
TEXT_KINGMF102_04947_WUKLAMAT_000_003<tab>Well, it was good to catch Koana up. Now we'll talk to the sol─ ...Hm?
TEXT_KINGMF102_04947_KOANA_000_004<tab>Who might this be from?
TEXT_KINGMF102_04947_WUKLAMAT_000_005<tab>Hello? ...That's right, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var> is with me.
TEXT_KINGMF102_04947_WUKLAMAT_000_006<tab>...Is that so? In that case, let's meet at Sunperch. See you soon!
TEXT_KINGMF102_04947_WUKLAMAT_000_007<tab>Y'shtola is heading back. I dare to hope she's found a way to pursue Sphene.
TEXT_KINGMF102_04947_WUKLAMAT_000_008<tab>If you all wanted to go on ahead to Sunperch, I'll pay our soldiers a quick call.
TEXT_KINGMF102_04947_YSHTOLA_000_010<tab>Apologies for the wait.
TEXT_KINGMF102_04947_WUKLAMAT_000_011<tab>You're all here. Then that means...
TEXT_KINGMF102_04947_GRAHATIA_000_012<tab>Aye. We believe we've found a way to travel to the reflection to where Sphene has retreated.
TEXT_KINGMF102_04947_ALISAIE_000_013<tab>I was busy providing aid in Solution Nine, so I haven't heard the details myself.
TEXT_KINGMF102_04947_ALISAIE_000_014<tab>Could you start from the beginning, Y'shtola?
TEXT_KINGMF102_04947_YSHTOLA_000_015<tab>Per Sphene's own words, the gate atop Everkeep was opened and closed by the power of interdimensional fusion.
TEXT_KINGMF102_04947_YSHTOLA_000_016<tab>And it was the artifact known as the key that allowed her to control it.
TEXT_KINGMF102_04947_KRILE_000_017<tab>According to Ketenramm, the key was brought with me to the Source twenty years ago.
TEXT_KINGMF102_04947_KRILE_000_018<tab>It was then kept here in the palace until its theft by Zoraal Ja, who used it in Yyasulani to fuse a portion of our world with this reflection.
TEXT_KINGMF102_04947_YSHTOLA_000_019<tab>Following Zoraal Ja's demise, Sphene claimed the key and disappeared through the gate.
TEXT_KINGMF102_04947_YSHTOLA_000_020<tab>But where exactly did that gate lead? In seeking the answer, we took another look at Origenics─and made a startling discovery.
TEXT_KINGMF102_04947_YSHTOLA_000_021<tab>As you all know, there should have been one more level at the summit of Everkeep.
TEXT_KINGMF102_04947_ALISAIE_010_021<tab>The twelfth level─the King of Resolve's royal abode.
TEXT_KINGMF102_04947_SHALE_020_021<tab>Right. But when you actually went there, you saw that it didn't exist.

TEXT_KINGMF102_04947_SHALE_000_022<tab>Curious, we analyzed Origenics's logs to see where the memories of the departed were being sent. And where should it be but <var 1A 02 /var>through<var 1A 01 /var> the gate, to the missing twelfth level.
TEXT_KINGMF102_04947_YSHTOLA_000_023<tab>That level alone must have lain outside the fused region, and so was left behind.
TEXT_KINGMF102_04947_ALISAIE_000_024<tab>Then it means...
TEXT_KINGMF102_04947_Q1_000_025<tab>What will you say?
TEXT_KINGMF102_04947_A1_000_026<tab>The reflection to which Sphene has fled is her own.
TEXT_KINGMF102_04947_A1_000_027<tab>Alphinaud, if you'd be so kind!
TEXT_KINGMF102_04947_YSHTOLA_000_028<tab>Indeed.
TEXT_KINGMF102_04947_YSHTOLA_000_029<tab>'Tis Sphene's home world, and she has returned there, to join the memories of her departed citizens.
TEXT_KINGMF102_04947_ALPHINAUD_000_030<tab>It means that beyond the gate lies not just any reflection, but the one from which Alexandria originally hailed.
TEXT_KINGMF102_04947_ALPHINAUD_000_031<tab>'Tis Sphene's home world, and she has returned there, to join the memories of her departed citizens.
TEXT_KINGMF102_04947_GRAHATIA_000_032<tab>But as the key lies with her on the other side, we haven't the means to reopen the gate.

TEXT_KINGMF102_04947_WUKLAMAT_000_033<tab>Forgive me, but I thought we already knew she had gone home─or at least it seemed obvious to me. What I want to know is, how do we pursue Sphene if the gate here is closed?
TEXT_KINGMF102_04947_KRILE_000_034<tab>We use another gate. And it just so happens we know where one is.
TEXT_KINGMF102_04947_ALISAIE_000_035<tab>The Skydeep Cenote!
TEXT_KINGMF102_04947_KRILE_000_036<tab>Aye. All evidence suggests that the gate there leads to the world whence the Alexandrians and I came.
TEXT_KINGMF102_04947_ALISAIE_000_037<tab>But assuming that's true, how can we open it?
TEXT_KINGMF102_04947_KRILE_000_038<tab>That is what we shall find out, using the code in this earring.
TEXT_KINGMF102_04947_SHALE_000_039<tab>As you'll recall, Krile's earring is in fact a data storage device.
TEXT_KINGMF102_04947_SHALE_000_040<tab>An analysis of it yielded a code─something used to control a contraption, and a very large one at that.
TEXT_KINGMF102_04947_GRAHATIA_000_041<tab>Given the circumstances of Krile's arrival in the Source, we believe that said contraption is the gate to the golden city.
TEXT_KINGMF102_04947_GRAHATIA_000_042<tab>This is admittedly an educated guess, but we are quite hopeful that it will work.
TEXT_KINGMF102_04947_WUKLAMAT_000_043<tab>To make such progress in so short a time... You really are amazing!
TEXT_KINGMF102_04947_YSHTOLA_000_044<tab>We couldn't have done it alone. The credit must go to the members of Oblivion for acquiring the information we needed, Shale especially.
TEXT_KINGMF102_04947_WUKLAMAT_000_045<tab>Right then, it seems the plan is set! To the Skydeep Cenote!
TEXT_KINGMF102_04947_GULOOLJA_000_020<tab>Aren't we going yet?
TEXT_KINGMF102_04947_WUKLAMAT_000_025<tab>I've told the officers of the Landsguard about my intention. They fully support our endeavor.
TEXT_KINGMF102_04947_KOANA_000_030<tab>Begging your pardon, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>, but might I have a moment ere setting forth?
TEXT_KINGMF102_04947_WUKLAMAT_000_031<tab>Oh, you're already going to give <var 08 E905 ((her)) ((him)) /var> the thing?
TEXT_KINGMF102_04947_KOANA_000_032<tab>Yes. I had thought to save it for later, but in light of these developments, I feel now is the time.
TEXT_KINGMF102_04947_KOANA_000_033<tab>As Lamaty'i says, I have something for you. Please come with me to Bayside Bevy.
TEXT_KINGMF102_04947_GULOOLJA_000_035<tab>Are these all shops? It's so different from Solution Nine!
TEXT_KINGMF102_04947_WUKLAMAT_000_040<tab>Hehe, I hope you like it!
TEXT_KINGMF102_04947_KOANA_000_050<tab>Tuliyollal is safe in no small part due to your valor. As a token of our appreciation, I have commissioned special equipment for you.
TEXT_KINGMF102_04947_KOANA_000_051<tab>While it is inadequate as an expression of gratitude, I pray it will serve you well in your coming mission.
TEXT_KINGMF102_04947_WUKLAMAT_000_052<tab>It apparently incorporates foreign technology. Leave it to Koana to request such a thing, eh?
TEXT_KINGMF102_04947_KOANA_000_053<tab>Mewazunte yonder has the equipment in his keeping. Just say the word, and he will bring it out.
TEXT_KINGMF102_04947_SYSTEM_000_100<tab>You may now obtain job-specific gear from Mewazunte.
TEXT_KINGMF102_04947_SYSTEM_000_101<tab>The weapons and gear obtained can be equipped at level 99. However, all item stats will be subject to item level sync.
TEXT_KINGMF102_04947_SYSTEM_000_102<tab>Upon reaching level 100 with the corresponding job, these items will no longer be synced.
TEXT_KINGMF102_04947_SYSTEM_000_103<tab>Furthermore, the gear can be dyed upon completion of the role quests associated with said job.
